# ai-bootcamp-w3 Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-12-25

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.12 (backend), Node.js 20+ (frontend), PostgreSQL 15 (database) + Docker 24+, Docker Compose V2, FastAPI, React 18, Vite 5, uvicorn, npm (002-docker-compose)
- PostgreSQL (containerized), SQLite (host-mounted for persistence), Docker volumes (002-docker-compose)

- Backend: Python 3.12+, Frontend: TypeScript 5.0+ (React 19+) + Backend: FastAPI 0.104+, Pydantic v2, sqlglot, OpenAI SDK, asyncpg, SQLAlchemy/SQLModel; Frontend: React 19, Refine 5, Ant Design 5, Monaco Editor, Tailwind CSS 4, Vite (001-db-query-tool)
